modName: Shadow of the Dovahkiin - Main Menu Replacer
summary: Shadow of the Dovahkiin, a main menu replacer for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
No longer see the Dovahkiin of legend as a Nord. Now, have the capability to envision yourself as the mighty Dragonborn, whether you are a Altmer, Argonian, Bosmer, Breton, Dunmer, Imperial, Khajiit, Orc, Redguard, or even if your character is of a modded race. Perceive the silhouette of the Dovahkiin as your main menu, while listening to the sound of glory.

What is provided in this mod:

Shadow of the Dovahkiin - Main Menu Replacer included with music
Music: Epic Score - Waiting For Gods
Link: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S6VYxL8nF5o

Shadow of the Dovahkiin - Main Menu Replacer with music alternative 1
Music: Epic Score - Do Not Stand In Our Way
Link: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aAmIGaKoV_g

Shadow of the Dovahkiin - Main Menu Replacer with music alternative 2
Music: Alexandros Nikolaidis - You Are The Chosen One
Link: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UHYAKbrbNgE

Shadow of the Dovahkiin - Main Menu Replacer with no music replacer
Download this version if you want to keep your current music, but want this background.
author: NebulousStorm
